schema.description: 查询结束时间，大于查询开始时间，与查询开始时间间隔小于31天。格式：yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mmZ（UTC时间）。

页码，取值：大于0且不超过Integer的最大值。

默认值：**1**。

CreateTime.description: 错误日志生成时间。格式：yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ（UTC时间）。

ErrorInfo.example: spid52 DBCC TRACEON 3499, server process ID (SPID) 52. This is an informational message only; no user action is required

400.errorMessage: search time range cannot be longer than a month.
A package instance is not allowed to operate independently.
Pricing plan price result not found.
You have not passed the real-name authentication and do not meet the purchase conditions. Please log in to the user center for real-name authentication.

responseDemo:
[{"type":"json","example":"{
  "PageNumber": 1,
  "RequestId": "98504E07-BB0E-40FC-B152-E4882615812C",
  "PageRecordCount": 30,
  "TotalRecordCount": 100,
  "Items": {
    "ErrorLog": [
      {
        "CreateTime": "2011-05-30T12:11:04Z",
        "ErrorInfo": "spid52 DBCC TRACEON 3499, server process ID (SPID) 52. This is an informational message only; no user action is required"
      }
    ]
  }
}","errorExample":"{
    "RequestId": "7463B73D-35CC-4D19-A010-6B8D65D242EF",
    "HostId": "rds.aliyuncs.com",
    "Code": "UnsupportedOperation",
    "Message": "The specified action is not supported."
}"},{"type":"xml","example":"<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<DescribeErrorLogsResponse>
	<RequestId>98504E07-BB0E-40FC-B152-E4882615812C</RequestId>
	<PageNumber>1</PageNumber>
	<TotalRecordCount>1</TotalRecordCount>
	<PageRecordCount>1</PageRecordCount>
	<Items>
		<ErrorLog>
			<ErrorInfo>spid52 DBCC TRACEON 3499, server process ID (SPID) 52. This is an informational message only; no user action is required</ErrorInfo>
			<CreateTime>2013-06-04T15:00:00</CreateTime>
		</ErrorLog>
    </Items>
</DescribeErrorLogsResponse>
	
","errorExample":""}]
title: 查看错误日志
summary: 该接口查询实例某段时间内的错误日志。
description:
### 适用引擎

- RDS MySQL
- RDS PostgreSQL
- RDS SQL Server
- RDS MariaDB
